text: وربك يعلم ما تكن صدورهم وما يعلنون

translations.translation: Your Lord knows what their hearts conceal and what they divulge.
Your Lord well knows what they hide in their breasts and what they disclose.
Your Lord knows all that their hearts conceal and all that they reveal.
Your Lord knows all that their hearts hide or reveal.
And your Lord knows what is hidden in their breasts, and what they disclose.
And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal, and what they reveal.
And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they manifest.
And thy Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they publish.
And thy Lord knoweth what their breasts conceal, and what they publish.
Your Lord knows what they conceal in their hearts and what they disclose.
And thy Lord knoweth that which their breasts conceal and that which they make known.
Your Lord knows whatever their breasts conceal, and whatever they disclose.
And thy Lord knows all that their hearts conceal and all that they reveal.
And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal, and what they reveal.
Your Lord knows what their chests hide and what they reveal.
And your Lord knows what their hearts conceal, and what they reveal.
And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.
[28:69] And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal, [what] their hearts keep secret of disbelief and otherwise, and what they proclaim, by their tongues of such things.
(And thy Lord knoweth what you breasts conceal) of hatred and enmity, (and what they publish) of transgressions.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ } معناه تَخفِي

translations.translation: And His saying, {Their hearts are concealed} [Qur'an 3:154], means that their hearts are hidden.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَرَبُّكَ } يا أكمل الرسل { يَعْلَمُ } بعلمه الحضوري { مَا تُكِنُّ } وتخفي { صُدُورُهُمْ } أي: ضمائرهم وقلوبهم { وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ } [القصص: 69] بجوارحهم وآلاتهم


{ وَ } كيف يخفى عليه شيء

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وربك يعلم ما تُكِنُّ } تُضمر { صدورُهم } من عداوة الرسول - عليه الصلاة والسلام - وحسده
 { وما يُعلنون } من مطاعنهم فيه
 وقولهم: هلاً اختير عليه غَيْرُهُ في النبوة
